task.title: How to Make a Breakfast Sandwich
task.shortdesc: A breakfast is both easy to make and filling.

step.cmd: Saut√© the tempeh bacon according to the package instructions in a medium skillet.
Lightly toast your English muffin in the same skillet after removing the tempeh.
Spread one side of your English muffin with a light coat of vegan mayo.
Spread the other side with some roasted garlic hummus.
On one half add 4 slices of tempeh bacon and add a sprinkle of the Daiya cheese on top of the tempeh bacon.
Make sure your sandwich is nice and hot before opening it up and adding 1-2 slices of butter lettuce, 1-2 slices of tomato, sliced avocado, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.
